attributes.action: Pass a law immediately to get the Ashes shown on national TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop this disgraceful sellout of most all of the nation's top sporting events. The Ashes should be available for everyone to watch. It would never happen in another country so why are you our government allowing this to go ahead. GET THIS CHANGED NOW WE THE PEOPLE DEMAND IT!!!!!!
